item.description: CloudTrail #aws #cloud #auditing #logs #monitoring Logs API calls between AWS services. when you need to know who to blame.
Cloudwatch #aws #cloud #monitoring #logs monitoring solution for all of the various AWS resources by AWS. Cloudwatch-Logs Centralized collection of logs.
Amazon Managed Grafana #aws #cloud #monitoring This is a fully managed service by AWS for Grafana, which is an open-source analytics and monitoring solution for databases.
Amazon Managed Service for Prometheus #aws #cloud #monitoring A AWS managed service for Prometheus, which is an open-source monitoring system and time series database.

AWS X-Ray #aws #cloud #monitoring A service from AWS to visualize the components of your application, identify performance bottlenecks, and troubleshoot requests that resulted in an error which will be handy on debugging serverless application.
